title: Fresh beef in McDonald's burgers
text:
Fresh beef in McDonald's burgers 4:09am IST - 01:33 
McDonald's started serving fresh beef Quarter Pounders and other premium burgers at about 3,500 restaurants in the United States, and it plans to expand the offering to most of its U.S. locations by May. Aleksandra Michalska reports.
